SEARCH
Package com.project.RabbitRun.entity

Class Entity

java.lang.Object
com.project.RabbitRun.entity.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Player
public class Entity extends Object
Represents an entity within the game, including attributes for position, speed, directional images, and collision handling.

  • Field Summary

    Field

    collisionOn
